description: Built growth-focused websites with SEO, UX, and conversion optimization. Developed and enhanced Shopify e-commerce stores. Finding solution to complex problems and leading a team of developers and designers.
Developed websites using Laravel, PHP, and WordPress, focusing on SEO-driven development and optimization. Handling multiple projects and working with a team of developers and managers.

As a Junior Developer, involved in the development of multiple frontend projects. While learning new technologies and frameworks, I also worked on improving my skills in Programmatic SEO, Conversion Rate Optimization, Digital Experience Optimization.
